name: Excuse me, I believe you have my stapler!?
name_original: Excuse me, I believe you have my stapler!?
description:
A short game using Pippin Barr's game idea: "You are an office shelf and you just can't get that stapler off your back" (see here)

Follow me on twitter @gamerpeldon (very few tweets - once or twice a month, game related stuff and new releases)
